changeSet.author: CONNECT_APP
changeSet.sql:
DECLARE @colectionIdNotYetConfigForC4SC4C TABLE(collectionId int) DECLARE @c4s VARCHAR(100) = 'c4s_brand_priority_avail_filter' DECLARE @c4c VARCHAR(100) = 'customer_brand_priority_avail_filter'
INSERT INTO @colectionIdNotYetConfigForC4SC4C SELECT ID from ORGANISATION_COLLECTION WHERE ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT COLLECTION_ID FROM ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS where SETTING_KEY =@c4s OR SETTING_KEY = @c4c)
INSERT INTO ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS (COLLECTION_ID, SETTING_KEY,SETTING_VALUE) SELECT collectionId,@c4s,'000' from @colectionIdNotYetConfigForC4SC4C
INSERT INTO ORG_COLLECTION_SETTINGS (COLLECTION_ID, SETTING_KEY,SETTING_VALUE) SELECT collectionId, @c4c,'011' from @colectionIdNotYetConfigForC4SC4C;
